title: Bolt of Fire
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|Fires a penetrating bolt of flames.}} '''Bolt of Fire''' is a monster-only spell capable of striking multiple targets along its path, dealing a considerable amount of [[fire]] damage. [[Fire#Fire_Resistance|Fire resistance]] reduces the damage dealt by this spell by 50% (rF+), 66% (rF++), or 80% (rF+++). The [[Fire Breath]] monster ability is very similar to this spell. Like other types of Fire Magic, bolts of fire that pass through [[water]] will create [[steam]], and are negated by [[freezing vapour|freezing clouds]]. {{monsters with spell}} ==History== {{Spell |name=Bolt of Fire |level=6 |school1={{Conjurations}} |school2={{Fire Magic}} |school3= |sources=
*[[Book of Fire]] *[[Book of the Dragon]]
|castingnoise=6 |spellnoise=6 }} {{AttackSpell |name=Bolt of Fire |formula = 6d(3+Power/9) [[fire]] |maxdmg = 6d25 |maxsp = 200 |range = 6 |target = Bolt |tohit = 10+Power/25 |special = N/A |hit_type = normal |hit_adder = 10 |hit_num = 1 |hit_denom = 25 |dam_calculator = calcdice |dam_numdice = 6 |dam_adder = 18 |dam_num = 2 |dam_denom = 3}} * Prior to [[0.26]], [[bolt spell]]s would decrease by 1 range for every target they hit. * Prior to [[0.25]], Bolt of Fire was a level 6 [[Conjurations]]/[[Fire Magic]] spell available to players.
